scene_description_enriched: A haloed figure, likely a saint, stands in a grassy field, holding an open book in their left hand and a palm frond in their right. The figure wears a blue robe over an orange undergarment and a white mantle. The background is a deep red with scattered gold floral motifs. The scene is set outdoors, with a stylized representation of grass and a decorative, patterned backdrop.
